file.name: petstore.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1
paths:
  /pets:
    $ref: "./pets/pets.yml"
  /petres:
    get:
      operationId: aaget
      responses:
        200:
          $ref: "./pets/response.yml"
